questions.question_text:
A developer completed the following steps:
1. Created a process with the REFramework
2. Published the package on Orchestrator
3. Created a job for it
Once these steps are performed, the job is started from Orchestrator and begins to process transactions. After two processed transactions, the job is stopped from Orchestrator. At which state in the framework will the job Stop Signal be recognized?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Get Transaction Data
Ans : C

Selected Answer: C
Siuuuuu! :)

Selected Answer: C
Answer is C

Selected Answer: C
Wrong answer

questions.question_text: When debugging a process, you run in Debug mode and are paused at a breakpoint. To execute only one activity at a time, which button should be clicked on the Debug tab of Studio?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A. Step Into
Ans : A

Selected Answer: A
Step sister... I mean Step Into

Selected Answer: A
Step Into execute only one activity at a time !

Selected Answer: A
the given answer is correct

Selected Answer: C
C. Checks only the current file for validation errors
Ans : C

Selected Answer: C
Siuuuuu !

Selected Answer: C
Tested in Studio !

Selected Answer: A
The given answer is correct.

comments.content: Wrong. The correct answer is C. It only checks for the current open file for validation errors, not the entire project.

questions.question_text: Which action is performed when the Validate File button is pressed on the “Analyze File” drop-down in UiPath Studio?

choices.B: Checks only the Main.xaml file for validation errors
choices.C: Checks only the current file for validation errors
choices.A: Checks all the project.xaml files for validation errors
choices.D: Checks only the project.json file for validation errors

discussion.content:

B. DT1 will have fewer rows. One row.

So B is the correct answer!
